title: The Nightingale (2013)

cast.name: Baotian Li
cast.character: Zhu Zhi Gen (Grandfather)       (as Li Bao Tian)

cast.name: Xiaoran Li
cast.character: Ren Quan Ying (Mother)       (as Xiao Ran Li)

cast.name: Huan Huan Wei
cast.character: Secrétaire de Chong Yi (Ching Yi's secretary)

cast.name: Jie Liu
cast.character: Vieil homme de parc (Old man in the park)

cast.name: Xian Hua Wu
cast.character: Femme de Mei Jiang (Wife of Mei Jiang)

cast.name: Shan Liang
cast.character: Vendeuse boutique a Yang Shuo (Saleswoman in Yang Shuo)

cast.name: Xiang Wu Luo
cast.character: Petit garçon avec oiseau (Small boy with bird)

overview: Zhigen, an old Chinese farmer, has lived alone in Beijing for over 20 years after moving to the city to allow his son Chongyi to attend university. He decides to make the long journey from Beijing to Yangshuo to honour the promise he made to his wife to bring back the bird that has been his only companion in the city. His daughter-in-law Qianying, a beautiful rich career woman, asks him to take along his granddaughter Renxing, an only child brought up in the lap of luxury. While grandfather and granddaughter set out on their journey - one travelling back in time, the other discovering her roots - Chongyi and Qianying, ponder the meaning of the life they have led in the sole pursuit of success and money.
storyline: The story of an elderly man and his granddaughter who walk together through China with a bird in a cage.
